commercials.description: iPhone Pro cinematic mode commercial - dramatic lighting, product focus

manual_data.title: iPhone Pro - Cinematic Mode

scenes.visual_description: Extreme close-up of iPhone camera lens, light refracting through sapphire glass, rack focus reveals sleek titanium body emerging from shadow, moody dark background with subtle blue rim lighting
Slow 360-degree dolly around iPhone floating in void, dramatic rim lighting creates halo effect, particle dust catches light, reflections dance across screen surface
Macro shot of titanium edges catching light at different angles, shallow depth of field, abstract bokeh background shifts colors, metal texture visible
Screen illuminates showing cinematic footage playback, camera pulls back smoothly to reveal full device, blue accent lighting pulses subtly

key_learnings: Product as hero - never show people talking to camera
Dramatic rim lighting creates premium perception
Slow pacing builds anticipation and luxury feel
Abstract dark backgrounds focus attention on product
Macro details showcase craftsmanship and quality
scene_descriptions: Extreme close-up of iPhone camera lens, light refracting through sapphire glass, rack focus reveals sleek titanium body emerging from shadow, moody dark background with subtle blue rim lighting
Slow 360-degree dolly around iPhone floating in void, dramatic rim lighting creates halo effect, particle dust catches light, reflections dance across screen surface
Macro shot of titanium edges catching light at different angles, shallow depth of field, abstract bokeh background shifts colors, metal texture visible
Screen illuminates showing cinematic footage playback, camera pulls back smoothly to reveal full device, blue accent lighting pulses subtly
Split screen transformation showing before/after image quality, smooth morphing transition effect
Aerial view of iPhone on reflective black surface, ripple effects emanate outward, lens flares streak across frame
Quick montage of feature icons - camera, chip, battery - all rendered as 3D product shots floating in space
Final hero shot with Apple logo fade-in, minimal white text on black, product centered with dramatic lighting

commercials.description: Just Do It campaign - high energy, athletic B-roll montage

manual_data.title: Nike - Just Do It Athletic Montage

scenes.visual_description: Extreme slow motion of running shoes hitting wet pavement, water droplets exploding outward in perfect detail, dramatic golden hour backlighting through morning fog
Wide crane shot rising over empty stadium at dawn, single runner silhouette in distance, golden hour rays streaming through stands
Close-up of athletic hands gripping barbell, chalk dust floating in beam of gym light, texture of calluses and determination visible

key_learnings: Fast cuts create energy and excitement
Slow motion reserved for impact moments only
Product shown in action context, never static
No dialogue needed - let visuals tell the story
Natural lighting adds authenticity to athletic footage
Quick montage rhythm matches music beat
scene_descriptions: Extreme slow motion of running shoes hitting wet pavement, water droplets exploding outward in perfect detail, dramatic golden hour backlighting through morning fog
Wide crane shot rising over empty stadium at dawn, single runner silhouette in distance, golden hour rays streaming through stands
Close-up of athletic hands gripping barbell, chalk dust floating in beam of gym light, texture of calluses visible
Tracking shot following basketball mid-dribble, Nike swoosh visible on shoe, court lights reflecting off polished floor
Aerial drone sweeping over mountain trail, lone runner moving through misty forest, epic landscape scale
Macro of shoe technology cross-section, animated fibers and air cushioning visible, materials exploding apart
Quick montage: punch bag impact, weights dropping, sprinter in blocks - 0.5 second cuts synced to beat
Final Nike swoosh animation emerging from particle effects, Just Do It tagline, black background

commercials.description: Model S Plaid launch - futuristic, clean aesthetic, performance showcase

manual_data.title: Tesla Model S Plaid - Pure Performance

scenes.visual_description: Wide establishing shot of empty desert highway stretching to horizon at sunrise, heat shimmer distorts air, red Tesla approaches as distant speck, dust trail visible
Tracking shot alongside car at high speed, camera mounted to chase vehicle, wheels spinning blur, landscape streaks past, aerodynamic body lines emphasized
Interior POV of empty cockpit, camera pans slowly across minimalist dashboard, 17-inch touchscreen glows with interface, yoke steering wheel catches light

key_learnings: Automotive commercials: environment + vehicle beauty shots only
Never show people talking - voiceover only if needed
Show performance through visual action, not spoken specs
Clean backgrounds highlight design language
Interior shots should be empty - focus on technology
Drone shots establish scale and environment
scene_descriptions: Wide establishing shot of empty desert highway stretching to horizon at sunrise, heat shimmer distorts air, red Tesla approaches as distant speck, dust trail visible
Tracking shot alongside car at high speed, camera mounted to chase vehicle, wheels spinning blur, landscape streaks past, aerodynamic body lines emphasized
Interior POV of empty cockpit, camera pans slowly across minimalist dashboard, 17-inch touchscreen glows with interface, yoke steering wheel catches light
Slow motion acceleration launch from standstill, rear tires emit slight smoke, car rockets forward, camera shake conveys G-force, frame rate ramps
Drone shot spiraling down from height to car parked at scenic overlook, sunset colors reflect off metallic paint, mountains in background
Final product shot on black turntable, 360-degree slow rotation, Tesla logo illuminated, minimal text overlay with specs

commercials.description: Belong Anywhere - lifestyle travel montage showcasing unique spaces

manual_data.title: Airbnb - Belong Anywhere

scenes.visual_description: Golden hour light streaming through large cabin window, mountain vista visible outside, warm interior glow on wooden surfaces, empty inviting armchair by fireplace
Drone rising smoothly over Tuscan villa at dawn, cypress trees lining gravel driveway, morning mist filling valley below, terracotta roof tiles catching first light
Macro detail of breakfast spread on rustic wooden table, steam rising from coffee cup, fresh croissants, jam jars, morning light through linen curtains

key_learnings: Show SPACES, not people talking about spaces
Natural lighting creates authenticity and warmth
Montage of diverse locations shows variety and possibility
Warm color grading enhances emotional connection
Details (food, textures, views) make spaces feel real
Empty spaces invite viewer to imagine themselves there
scene_descriptions: Golden hour light streaming through large cabin window, mountain vista visible outside, warm interior glow on wooden surfaces, empty inviting armchair by fireplace
Drone rising smoothly over Tuscan villa at dawn, cypress trees lining gravel driveway, morning mist filling valley below, terracotta roof tiles catching first light
Macro detail of breakfast spread on rustic wooden table, steam rising from coffee cup, fresh croissants, jam jars, morning light through linen curtains
Gimbal walk-through of modern city loft, floor-to-ceiling windows reveal skyline, afternoon light casting long shadows, minimalist furniture
Time-lapse of sunset from beach house deck, waves rolling in rhythm, palm tree silhouettes sway, sky transitions through orange to purple
Cozy reading nook detail - stacked books, cashmere throw blanket draped over chair, warm lamp glow, rain visible on nearby window
Aerial of tropical treehouse nestled in jungle canopy, rope bridge visible, morning birds flying past, exotic foliage
Night exterior of tiny house with string lights, Milky Way visible above, small campfire smoke drifting, warm interior glow through windows
Morning coffee on Amsterdam balcony, canal boats gliding below, bicycles parked on bridge, church bells suggested
Final Airbnb logo over animated globe, location dots pulsing across continents, Belong Anywhere tagline

commercials.description: AI automation consultancy commercial - cyberpunk aesthetic, abstract visualizations

manual_data.title: Barrios A2I - Transform Your Business

scenes.visual_description: Dark futuristic control room with curved monitor walls, flowing data visualizations in teal and gold, volumetric light rays cutting through atmosphere, camera slowly dollies through the space, holographic AI interfaces hover and pulse

Split screen transformation sequence: left side shows chaos (papers flying, cluttered desk, endless loading bars, frustrated iconography) morphing through digital dissolve into right side order (clean minimal workspace, instant results, smooth flowing automation, satisfaction iconography), time-lapse energy

Abstract 3D visualization of AI neural network in deep space, data nodes as crystalline structures connecting with golden light trails, camera cranes upward through the network, particles coalesce into dashboard graphs showing exponential growth curves

Hero shot of sleek laptop displaying Barrios A2I interface, crystalline teal glow emanating from screen casting light on dark environment, camera orbits 360 degrees, golden accent particles float around device, logo reveals with subtle pulse animation

key_learnings: Tech/service commercials: show TRANSFORMATION, not explanation
Abstract visualizations represent intangible services effectively
Brand colors (teal + gold) should be consistent throughout
No talking heads - let visuals tell the story
Cyberpunk/futuristic aesthetic conveys cutting-edge capability
Before/after visual storytelling is powerful for services
scene_descriptions: Dark futuristic control room with curved monitor walls, flowing data visualizations in teal and gold, volumetric light rays cutting through atmosphere, camera slowly dollies through the space, holographic AI interfaces hover and pulse

Split screen transformation sequence: left side shows chaos (papers flying, cluttered desk, endless loading bars) morphing into right side order (clean workspace, instant results, smooth automation), time-lapse energy

Abstract 3D visualization of AI neural network in deep space, data nodes as crystalline structures connecting with golden light trails, camera cranes upward through the network, particles coalesce into dashboard graphs showing growth

Hero shot of sleek laptop displaying Barrios A2I interface, crystalline teal glow emanating from screen, camera orbits 360 degrees, golden accent particles float around device, logo reveals with subtle pulse animation
